s9.message: Blockable items: Searching for filter text now possible as well

s8.message: Blockable items: Opening in new tab works properly in Songbird now

s3.message: Start-up performance improvements by Nickolay Ponomarev (bug 20410, bug 20411, bug 20412)

s2.message: List of recommended filter subscriptions extended and made scrollable again

s7.message: Blockable items: Clicking in the State column now disables/re-enables the filter

s6.message: Blockable items: New state icon for items matching disabled filters

s5.message: Blockable items: Matching disabled filters now displayed — for easier re-enabling (forum topic)

s4.message: Added a possibility to restrict filters to some domains with the $domain=foo.com|bar.com option (documentation, forum topic)

s19.message: Fixed: Filter list in Preferences sometimes won't update properly if filters are added/removed (forum topic)

s18.message: Fixed: Element hiding might change page layout even on whitelisted sites (forum topic, issue still exists in Firefox 2.0)

s13.message: Toolbar button now has a context menu (same as dropdown menu)

s12.message: Preferences: "Tip of the day" replaced by "Getting started" in Help menu

s11.message: Filter composer: Added "Select all" and "Select none" for type checkboxes (forum topic)

s10.message: Filter composer: extensions.adblockplus.composer_default preference now decides which suggestion should be selected by default (forum topic)

s17.message: Fixed: Toolbar button shouldn't have the same title as the Tools menu item

s16.message: Regression fixed: Frames are not collapsed in some situations (forum topic)

s15.message: Format version is now being saved to patterns.ini

s14.message: Added support for item type "media" (will be added in Firefox 3.1 for HTML audio/video tags)

s22.message: Fixed: Filter list import doesn't remove checksum comment

s23.message: Object tabs no longer shown for invisible objects

s20.message: Fixed: Removed filters still apply if two different filters were translated into same regular expression

s21.message: Fixed: Filters like "[Foo]" mess up filter storage file

s26.message: Fixed: Element hiding doesn't work for chrome documents (Firefox 2.0/Thunderbird 2.0 only, forum topic)

s27.message: Fixed: $collapse flag not being read correctly from patterns.ini

s24.message: Changed placement of object tabs in document to avoid breaking some sites (forum topic)

s25.message: K-Meleon: Fixed handling of some menu items in toolbar icon's menu

s28.message: Fixed: Toolbar button shouldn't have a drop-down arrow if extensions.adblockplus.defaulttoolbaraction preference is 0
